Physical activity and exercise
Any bodily movement that requires energy expenditure such as playing, working, 
moving around, doing household chores and recreational activities is physical 
activity. 
Exercise is a category of physical activity that a person does consciously to maintain 
physical and mental fitness. Adequate and regular physical activity at all stages of 
life is one of the most important things for remaining healthy.
